entry.title: Vinyl Bonded Foam Rolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 0.00

Carpet bonded foam is used for most martial arts, gymnastics, fitness, wrestling and training studios along with trampoline air parks.  The foam flooring can be used for other high impact areas for dance, martial arts, and even as wall padding.

Vinyl bonded crosslinked polyethylene foam with vinyl top layer is available in 2 thicknesses.

Kodiak vinyl bonded foam is designed with flexible/slit backing.

Vinyl bonded foam is available in the standard Polyethylene.

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 6'W x 42'
  • Standard PE rolls are available in 1-3/8” and 2″ thicknesses.

Kodiak also manufactures vault runways, as well as sizes of practice mats of different sizes.

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Light Gray, Purple, Red, and Yellow

Custom Sizes:

Custom size vinyl bonded rolls are not offered at this time.

entry.title: Velcro For Carpet Bonded Foam 4"W x 42'L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 44.99

Kodiak sells Velcro for carpet bonded foam is sold in 4"W x 42'L Rolls.

The 4"W Velcro holds the carpet bonded foam rolls together by joining the face fiber on the rolls.

The 4" hook/width is also ideal for simulating a floor balance beam. Velcro can be used to mark zones on the floor or separate areas with different colors.

The Velcro hook will only stick to carpet bonded foam NOT to Flex Floor Ex carpet. 

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 4"W x 42'L

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Charcoal, Green, Light Gray, Orange, Pink, Purple, Red, and Teal.

Custom Sizes:

Not available at this time, all Velcro rolls are 42'L

entry.title: Carpet Bonded Foam Rolls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kodiak Sports, LLC
Type: Foam Flooring
Price: 0.00

Carpet bonded foam is used for most gymnastic, cheerleading studios along with trampoline air parks.  The foam flooring can be used for other high impact areas for dance, martial arts, and even as wall padding.

Kodiak Carpet bonded foam is available in solid/flat backing or the flex/slit backing.

Carpet bonded foam is available in the standard Polyethylene, EVA foam option is also available.

What's the difference? EVA foam is considered a premium foam. It’s slightly softer and more flexible. There is presumed to be some additional rebound and shock absorption as well.

Standard Rolls Specs

  • Size: 6'W x 42'
  • Standard PE rolls are available in 1-3/8” and 2″ thicknesses.
  • EVA backed rolls are available in 1-1/2″ and 2″ thicknesses. 

Kodiak also manufactures vault runways, as well as sizes of practice mats of different sizes.

Colors Available:

Black, Blue, Charcoal, Green, Light Gray, Orange, Pink, Purple, Red, and Teal.

Velcro

Rolls come with velcro to join. You get 1 velcro strip per seam.
IE: Order 1 Roll, no velcro. Order 2 rolls, you get 1 strip of velcro. Order 4 rolls, you get 3 strips of velcro.

Custom Sizes:

Custom size carpet bonded foam rolls are available with a longer lead time(4 weeks)
Max Width: 78"
Max Length: 90'

entry.title: Kodiak EcoSafe Folding Gym Floor Mats - 2.5" Thick Combo Foam
entry.summary:
Vendor: CoverSports
Type: Fitness Mats
Price: 189.99 - 499.99 (90 variants)

The 2.5" Thick combo one layer of Extra-firm bonded foam to one layer of the Flex-firm foam; which is slightly softer This provides a semi-soft cushioning with a firm landing and stable shock absorption for medium impact activities. The extra firm layer prevents bottoming out from impact.

It is softer/more cushioning than the medium firm mats; and will be less stable for static activities/exercises. Your feet will sink into the mat and it is not for high impact activity.  Great for home exercise activity and general fitness applications.

Uses

  • Fitness / Gym Mats
  • Martial Arts
  • Beginner and Intermediate Gymnastics
  • Home Workouts

Features

  • Made in the USA!
  • Toxin-free
  • Latex-free
  • Hypo-allergenic
  • Fire-retardant
  • 100% recyclable

entry.title: Kodiak EcoSafe Folding Gym Floor Mats - 2" Thick Flex-Firm
entry.summary:
Vendor: CoverSports
Type: Fitness Mats
Price: 189.99 - 499.99 (90 variants)

The 2" Thick flex-firm foam provides soft cushioning for low impact activities. Ideal for teaching basic gymnastic exercises with young children. The flex-firm foam is for low shock absorption.

It is softer/more cushioning than the medium firm mats; and will be less stable for static activities/exercises. Your feet will sink into the mat and it is not for high impact activity.  Great for home exercise activity and general fitness applications.

Uses

  • Fitness / Gym Mats
  • Low Level Gymnastics
  • Home Workouts

Features

  • Made in the USA!
  • Toxin-free
  • Latex-free
  • Hypo-allergenic
  • Fire-retardant
  • 100% recyclable

entry.title: Kodiak EcoSafe Folding Gym Floor Mats - 1 3/8" Thick Extra Firm
entry.summary:
Vendor: CoverSports
Type: Fitness Mats
Price: 159.99 - 429.99 (90 variants)

The 1 3/8" Thick foam high density offers firm, lightweight shock absorption for top recoil. Provides stable
landing surface that won’t bottom out. The extra firm mats provides firm footing and “street conditions”, no sinking.

The extra firm mats provide impact cushion; but stability on ankles, joints and wrists.

Uses

  • Fitness / Gym Mats
  • Advanced Gymnastics
  • Cheerleading

Features

  • Made in the USA!
  • Toxin-free
  • Latex-free
  • Hypo-allergenic
  • Fire-retardant
  • 100% recyclable

entry.title: Airex Mini Balance Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Airex
Type: Exercise Mats
Price: 44.99

Product Description

The Balance-pad Mini was developed particularly for the requirements in functional training and it is also ideal for traveling. In addition to its use as an active training tool, it offers the trainer good support when instructing. The smaller training area is ideal for one-legged and single-handed functional exercises as well as for dynamic training and it makes the Balance-pad Mini fit into any sports bag or hand luggage.

Approved Uses:

 
Balance
 Physiotherapy
&
Rehabilitation		 Fitness/Prevention  Group Exercise

 

Dimensions: Approx. 9.8" × 16.1" × 2.4"
Weight: Approx. .8 lbs

s:variant.title: Charcoal

entry.title: Airex Balance Beam
entry.summary:
Vendor: Airex
Type: Exercise Mats
Price: 139.99

Product Description

The Airex balance beam used mainly in physiotherapy to regain walking and foot functions. The flat beam is safe for balancing and training.

Approved Uses:

 
Balance
 Physiotherapy
&
Rehabilitation		 Fitness/Prevention  Group Exercise

 

Dimensions: Approx. 63.0" × 9.4" × 2.4"
Weight: Approx. 2.0 lbs

s:variant.title: Blue

entry.title: Airex X-Large Balance Pad
entry.summary:
Vendor: Airex
Type: Exercise Mats
Price: 139.99

Product Description

The AIREX elite balance pad has a waffle texture on the upper and lower sides; which simultaneously provides a slip-resistant and a pleasant stimulation of the foot receptors during barefoot balance training.

Thanks to destabilization with the Balance Pad Elite, the body is constantly challenged in order to maintain balance and stabilize the joints. Training with the Balance Pad Elite can purposefully improve conditional and coordination abilities in combination, for example strength, endurance, differentiation and balance.

Approved Uses:

 
Balance
 Physiotherapy
&
Rehabilitation		 Fitness/Prevention  Group Exercise

 

Dimensions: Approx. 38.6" × 16.1" × 2.4"
Weight: Approx. 3.1 lbs

s:variant.title: Blue

Vendor: Airex
Type: Exercise Mats
Price: 64.99

Product Description

The Balance Pad has a smooth surface; which is ideal for someone starting out with barefoot balance training. Due to the yielding foam, the body is constantly challenged in order to maintain balance and stabilize the joints. Training with the Balance Pad can purposefully improve conditional and coordination abilities in combination, for example strength, endurance, differentiation and balance.

entry.title: Airex Fitline 140 Entry Level Space Saver Fitness Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Airex
Type: Exercise Mats
Price: 59.99

Product Description

The AIREX Fitline 140 fitness and gymnastics mat is the classic entry-level mat for home training. It is space-saving, yet offers adequate room for the head and torso. The Fitline 140 is a very popular mat for commercial group fitness studios and is an excellent all around choice.

The Fitline 140 is extremely lightweight, very handy and can fit in any sports bag. The mat is available in 4 bright, modern colors to keep your studio or home fitness space up beat and bright!

Approved Uses:
Fitness/Prevention Pilates  Group Exercise

 

Dimensions: Approx. 55.1" × 23.6" × 0.4"
Weight: Approx. 2.6 lbs

Kiwi

Charcoal

entry.title: Airex Fitline 180 MidSize Entry Level Home Fitness Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: Airex
Type: Exercise Mats
Price: 69.99

Product Description

The AIREX Fitline 180 fitness and gymnastics mat is the classic entry-level mat for home training. It is space-saving, yet offers adequate room for the head and torso. The Fitline 180 is a very popular mat for basic home use and is a little thinner than the Coronella 185 mat.

The Fitline 180 is extremely lightweight, very handy and can fit in any sports bag. The mat is available in 4 bright, modern colors to keep your studio or home fitness space up beat and bright!

Approved Uses:
Fitness/Prevention Pilates  Group Exercise

 

Dimensions: Approx. 70.9" × 23.6" × 0.4"
Weight: Approx. 3.3 lbs

entry.title: Airex Coronella 185 Commercial Grade Fitness Mat - Best Seller!
entry.summary:
Vendor: Airex
Type: Exercise Mats
Price: 109.99

Product Description

The Coronella 185 gymnastics mat is the top selling all around commercial grade fitness mat.  The Coronella 185 features an ideal combination of perfect size dimensions, skin-friendly material, effective hygiene protection, slip-resistance, stability and a virtually unlimited lifespan.

Its optimum price/performance ratio makes it our bestseller.

The Coronella 185 features optimal cushioning and dampening characteristics for your joints, ligaments and tendons.  It ensures they are effectively protected, even with existing knee or back problems; training with the Coronella 185 is very pleasant, comfortable and safe. Due to it's comfort, versatility, durability it is a popular choice when it comes to equipping professional group fitness studios. The mat also offers comfort and durability with an optimum price/performance ratio for training at home.


Approved Uses:
Physiotherapy
&
Rehabilitation		 Fitness/Prevention Pilates  Group Exercise

 

Dimensions: Approx. 72.8" × 23.6" × 0.6"
Weight: Approx. 4.9 lbs
